=======
 To do
=======

The following features should be implemented over the next months:

- user management

- person data

  * store picture per person

  * add customizable free text fields

- company as entity

- import

  * vCard

  * XLS

  * SQLite (Apple's Addressbook.app)

- export

  * custom XLS export

  * LDAP export

- translation of user interface into German

- better search

  * full text search

  * combined search

  * wildcard search
